jam
Class RunControl

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Dialog
                  javax.swing.JDialog
                      jam.RunControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.event.ActionListener, Controller, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class RunControl
extends javax.swing.JDialog
implements Controller, java.awt.event.ActionListener

Class for data acquistion and run control. This class

  • starts and stops acquisition,
  • begins and ends runs

begin run:

  • starts acquisition
  • opens event file

end run:

  • stops acquisition
  • closes event file
  • writes out summary data file

Author:
Ken Swartz, Dale Visser
See Also:
Serialized Form

public void startAcq()
Starts acquisition of data. Figure out if online or offline an run appropriate method.

Throws:
JamException - all exceptions given to JamException go to the console

Tells VME to stop acquisition, and suspends the net listener.
